name: Emmerholt: Prologue
description: This is the prologue of Emmerholt - an upcoming open world, magic wielding, story driven, adventure game for the HTC Vive, and Oculus Touch. Currently in development by Oneiric Entertainment!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 (64 bit) or higher Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 equivalent or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
